remarks: Evaluating the recursive definition generator produces an ordinal. There is a hypothesis that the characteristic function produces ordinals on ordinal arguments.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 26-Jul-2019.)
statement:
rdgon.1 $e |- ( ph -> F Fn _V ) $.
rdgon.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
rdgon.3 $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. On ( F ` x ) e. On ) $.
rdgon $p |- ( ( ph /\ B e. On ) -> ( rec ( F , A ) ` B ) e. On ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d ph x $.
